title: Card and Writing Table (Table à quadrille brisée)
description: Card and Writing Table (Table à quadrille brisée); Unknown; Paris, France; about 1725; Oak and fir veneered with bloodwood, kingwood and wamara; mahogany; drawers of walnut and oak; gilt-bronze mounts; silvered-bronze fittings; iron fittings; modern silk velvet; 74 × 101.3 × 101.6 cm (29 1/8 × 39 7/8 × 40 in.); 75.DA.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
